chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_snd: BaseParams
base_fst: BaseParams
labeled_multi_fst: LabeledMultiParams base_fst
labeled_multi_snd: LabeledMultiParams base_snd
base_map: BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd
name_map: MultiParamsNameTotalMap unlabeled_multi_params unlabeled_multi_params
msg_map: MultiParamsMsgPartialMap unlabeled_multi_params unlabeled_multi_params
label_map: LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap labeled_multi_fst labeled_multi_snd
name_map_bijective: MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map
multi_map_congr: MultiParamsPartialMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map
multi_map_lb_congr: LabeledMultiParamsPartialMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map label_map
label_eq_dec: forall x y : label, {x = y} + {x <> y}
tot_map_label_injective: forall l l' : label, tot_map_label l = tot_map_label l' -> l = l'
label_tot_mapped: forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l'

Goal:
forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed failed' : list name) (lb : label) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), tot_map_label lb = label_silent -> lb_step_ordered_failure (failed, net) lb (failed', net') tr -> lb_step_ordered_failure (List.map tot_map_name failed, pt_map_onet net) label_silent (List.map tot_map_name failed', pt_map_onet net') [] /\ filterMap pt_map_trace_ev tr = []

Premises:
pt_map_trace_ev = fun (base_fst base_snd : BaseParams) (multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst) (multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd) (base_map : BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd) (name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd) (e : name * (input + output)) => let (n, s) := e in match s with | inl i => match pt_map_input i with | Some i' => Some (tot_map_name n, inl i') | None => None end |
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
MultiParamsNameTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
label = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, _, _) := LabeledMultiParams0 in label : forall P : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams P -> Type Arguments label {P LabeledMultiParams}
Record BaseParamsPartialMap (P0 P1 : BaseParams) : Type := Build_BaseParamsPartialMap { pt_map_data : data -> data; pt_map_input : input -> option input; pt_map_output : output -> option output } Arguments Build_BaseParamsPartialMap _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Record MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (M : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) : Prop := Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective { tot_map_name_inv_inverse : forall n : name, tot_map_name_inv (tot_map_name n) = n; tot_map_name_inverse_inv : forall n : name, tot_map_name (tot_map_name_inv n) = n } Arguments MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective {B0 B
MultiParamsPartialMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), BaseParamsPartialMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> MultiParamsMsgPartialMap P0 P1 -> Prop
Record ordered_network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkONetwork { onwPackets : name -> name -> list msg; onwState : name -> data } Arguments ordered_network {P params} Arguments mkONetwork {P params} (_ _)%function_scope
MultiParamsMsgPartialMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
LabeledMultiParamsPartialMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : LabeledMultiParams B0) (P1 : LabeledMultiParams B1), BaseParamsPartialMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap unlabeled_multi_params unlabeled_multi_params -> MultiParamsMsgPartialMap unlabeled_multi_params unlabeled_multi_params -> LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
Record LabeledMultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_LabeledMultiParams { lb_name : Type; lb_msg : Type; lb_msg_eq_dec : forall x y : lb_msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; lb_name_eq_dec : forall x y : lb_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; lb_nodes : list lb_name; lb_all_names_nodes : forall n : lb_name, In n lb_nodes; lb_no_dup_nodes : NoDup lb_nodes; label : Type; label_silent : label; lb_init
Inductive lb_step_ordered_failure (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation (list name * ordered_network) label (name * (input + output)) := LabeledStepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb
pt_map_onet = fun (base_fst base_snd : BaseParams) (multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst) (multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd) (base_map : BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd) (name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd) (msg_map : MultiParamsMsgPartialMap multi_fst multi_snd) (onet : ordered_network) => {| onwPackets := fun src dst : name => filterMap pt_map_msg (onwPackets onet (tot_map_name_inv src) (tot_map
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
tot_map_label = fun (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : LabeledMultiParams B0) (P1 : LabeledMultiParams B1) (LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap0 : LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap P0 P1) => let (tot_map_label) := LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap0 in tot_map_label : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : LabeledMultiParams B0) (P1 : LabeledMultiParams B1), LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap P0 P
Module List := Struct Module ListNotations Definition hd : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> A. Definition hd_error : forall A : Type, list A -> option A. Definition tl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A. Definition In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop. Parameter nil_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), [] <> x :: l. Parameter destruct_list : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), {x : A & {tl : list A |
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
unlabeled_multi_params = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams base_params) => {| name := lb_name; msg := lb_msg; msg_eq_dec := lb_msg_eq_dec; name_eq_dec := lb_name_eq_dec; nodes := lb_nodes; all_names_nodes := lb_all_names_nodes; no_dup_nodes := lb_no_dup_nodes; init_handlers := lb_init_handlers; net_handlers := unlabeled_net_handlers; input_handlers := unlabeled_input_handlers |} : forall base_params : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams base_params -> MultiParams
filterMap : (?A -> option ?B) -> list ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [base_fst : BaseParams base_snd : BaseParams labeled_multi_fst : LabeledMultiParams base_fst labeled_multi_snd : LabeledMultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap unlabeled_multi_params unlabeled_multi_params msg_map : MultiParamsMsgPartialMap unlabeled_multi_params unlabeled_multi_params label_map : LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap labeled_multi_fst labeled_multi_snd name_map_bijective
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> infseq A -> infseq B
label_silent = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, label_silent, _, _, _) as LabeledMultiParams return label := LabeledMultiParams0 in label_silent : forall (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams : LabeledMultiParams P), label Arguments label_silent {P LabeledMultiParams}
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
tot_map_name = fun (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) => let (tot_map_name, _) := MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 in tot_map_name : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> name -> name Arguments tot_map_name {B0 B1 P
LabeledMultiParamsLabelTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams B0 -> LabeledMultiParams B1 -> Type
lb_step_ordered_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_1_non_silent : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed failed' : list name) (lb : label) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), tot_map_label lb <> label_silent -> lb_step_ordered_failure (failed, net) lb (failed', net') tr -> lb_step_ordered_failure (List.map tot_map_name failed, pt_map_onet net) (tot_map_label lb) (List.map tot_map_name failed', pt_map_onet net') (filterMap pt_map_trace_ev tr)
lb_step_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_1_silent : forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name) (lb : label) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), tot_map_label lb = label_silent -> lb_step_failure (failed, net) lb (failed', net') tr -> lb_step_failure (List.map tot_map_name failed, pt_map_net net) label_silent (List.map tot_map_name failed', pt_map_net net') [] /\ filterMap trace_non_empty_out (filterMap pt_map_trace_occ tr) = []
lb_step_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_1_non_silent : forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name) (lb : label) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), tot_map_label lb <> label_silent -> lb_step_failure (failed, net) lb (failed', net') tr -> lb_step_failure (List.map tot_map_name failed, pt_map_net net) (tot_map_label lb) (List.map tot_map_name failed', pt_map_net net') (filterMap pt_map_trace_occ tr)
step_ordered_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed failed' : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParamsPartialMapCongruency ?fail_msg_fst ?fail_msg_snd ?msg_map]
lb_step_ordered_failure_tot_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed failed' : list name) (lb : label) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), lb_step_ordered_failure (failed, net) lb (failed', net') tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- LabeledMultiParamsTotalMapCongruency ?base_map ?name_map ?msg_map ?label_map]
lb_step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> label -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p l p0 l0
lb_step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> label -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p l p0 l0
lb_step_failure_tot_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name) (lb : label) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), lb_step_failure (failed, net) lb (failed', net') tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- LabeledMultiParamsTotalMapCongruency ?base_map ?name_map ?msg_map ?label_map]
lb_step_ordered_dynamic_failure_tot_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed failed' : list name) (lb : label) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), lb_step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) lb (failed', net') tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- LabeledMultiParamsTotalMapCongruency ?base_map ?name_map ?msg_map ?label_map]
step_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailureParamsPartialMapCongruency ?fail_fst ?fail_snd ?base_map]
step_ordered_pt_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), step_ordered net net' tr -> step_ordered (pt_map_onet net) (pt_map_onet net') (filterMap pt_map_trace_ev tr) \/ pt_map_onet net' = pt_map_onet net /\ filterMap pt_map_trace_ev tr = []
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed failed' : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), NoDup (odnwNodes net) -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- NewMsgParamsPartialMapCongruency ?new_msg_fst ?new_msg_snd ?msg_map]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepFailure_reboot : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name), In h failed -> failed' = remove name_eq_dec h failed -> net' = {| nwPackets := nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (reboot (nwState net h)) |} ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailureParams ?P]
step_ordered_failure_tot_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed failed' : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParamsTotalMapCongruency ?fail_msg_fst ?fail_msg_snd ?msg_map]
LabeledStepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> lb_net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (lb, out, d, l) ->...-> lb_step_ordered_failure (failed, net) lb (failed, net') tr
step_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_star_1 : forall (net : network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailureParamsPartialMapCongruency ?fail_fst ?fail_snd ?base_map]
StepOrderedFailure_fail : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name), ~ In h failed -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) (map2snd msg_fail (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed nodes))); onwState := onwState net |} ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
Inductive lb_step_ordered_dynamic_failure (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation (list name * ordered_dynamic_network) label (name * (input + output)) := LabeledStepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to =...
LabeledStepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : lb_name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list lb_name) (tr : list (lb_name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), ~ In h failed -> lb_input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (lb, out, d, l) ->...-> lb_step_ordered_failure (failed, net) lb (failed, net') tr
step_ordered_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_star_1 : forall (net : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), step_ordered_failure_star step_ordered_failure_init (failed, net) tr ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParamsPartialMapCongruency ?fail_msg_fst ?fail_msg_snd ?msg_map]
StepFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets h l ++ nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailureParams ?P]
StepFailure_drop : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailureParams ?P]
StepFailure_dup : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwState := nwState net |} ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailureParams ?P]
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailureParams ?P]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_fail : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_fail (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net)))); odnwState := odnwState net |} ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_start : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) ->...-> l = l' label_tot_mapped : forall l : label, exists l' : label, l = tot_map_label l' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
